Class BoardPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class BoardPane
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    The BoardPanel class displays the board of a given game.
